name: Philip Barese
role: inconspicuously making your coffee while overhearing all your secret plans.

name: Jordan Rails
role: changing the face of education -- and making sure that no one catches on.

name: William Lake
role: gaming the system, the man, and you in ways you'll never dream.

name: Kenneth Visigoth
role: sacking Rome, and several other political bodies in the process.

name: Brian Phillips
role: attaining and distributing knowledge about every aspect of the mission, and you.

name: David Perez
role: making sure we all make it where we're going, and make it home safe; at 250km/h or faster.
